mapper.delete: update chas_yw_jqxx set isdel = 1,xgsj = date_trunc('second', now()) where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into chas_yw_jqxx (id, jqbh, jqmc, jqdd, cjmj, cjmj_sfzh, cjdw, cjdw_dm, cjnr, cjsj, jqly, jqlyms, jqlb, jqlbms, jqzt, jqztms, jbrxm, jbr_sfzh, bjsj, bjdh, pdddsj, pdjssj, ddxcsj, cjcs, cjjg, cjyj, lrr_sfzh, lrsj, xgr_sfzh, xgsj, org_sys_code, isdel, data_flag, sjbq, shzt, sftx, shsj) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jqbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jqmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jqdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cjmj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cjmjSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cjdw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cjdwDm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cjnr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cjsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{jqly,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jqlyms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jqlb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jqlbms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jqzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jqztms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jbrxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jbrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bjsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{bjdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pdddsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{pdjssj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ddxcsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cjcs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cjjg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cjyj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lrrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lrsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{xgrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xgsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{orgSysCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isdel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dataFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sjbq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{shzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sftx,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update chas_yw_jqxx set jqbh = #{jqbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jqmc = #{jqmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jqdd = #{jqdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cjmj = #{cjmj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cjmj_sfzh = #{cjmjSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cjdw = #{cjdw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cjdw_dm = #{cjdwDm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cjnr = #{cjnr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cjsj = #{cjsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, jqly = #{jqly,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jqlyms = #{jqlyms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jqlb = #{jqlb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jqlbms = #{jqlbms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jqzt = #{jqzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jqztms = #{jqztms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jbrxm = #{jbrxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jbr_sfzh = #{jbrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bjsj = #{bjsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, bjdh = #{bjdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pdddsj = #{pdddsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, pdjssj = #{pdjssj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ddxcsj = #{ddxcsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, cjcs = #{cjcs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cjjg = #{cjjg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cjyj = #{cjyj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lrr_sfzh = #{lrrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lrsj = #{lrsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, xgr_sfzh = #{xgrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xgsj = #{xgsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, org_sys_code = #{orgSysCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isdel = #{isdel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, data_flag = #{dataFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sjbq = #{sjbq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, shzt = #{shzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sftx = #{sftx,jdbcType=INTEGER}, shsj = #{shsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, jqbh, jqmc, jqdd, cjmj, cjmj_sfzh, cjdw, cjdw_dm, cjnr, cjsj, jqly, jqlyms, jqlb, jqlbms, jqzt, jqztms, jbrxm, jbr_sfzh, bjsj, bjdh, pdddsj, pdjssj, ddxcsj, cjcs, cjjg, cjyj, lrr_sfzh, lrsj, xgr_sfzh, xgsj, org_sys_code, isdel, data_flag, sjbq, shzt, sftx, shsj from chas_yw_jqxx where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and isdel != 1

select id, jqbh, jqmc, jqdd, cjmj, cjmj_sfzh, cjdw, cjdw_dm, cjnr, cjsj, jqly, jqlyms, jqlb, jqlbms, jqzt, jqztms, jbrxm, jbr_sfzh, bjsj, bjdh, pdddsj, pdjssj, ddxcsj, cjcs, cjjg, cjyj, lrr_sfzh, lrsj, xgr_sfzh, xgsj, org_sys_code, isdel, data_flag, sjbq, shzt, sftx, shsj from chas_yw_jqxx where 1 = 1 and isdel = 0
and jqbh = '${jqbh}'
and jqlb = '${jqlx}'
and jqmc like '${jqmc}%'
and cjdw_dm = '${cjdwDm}'
and org_sys_code = '${orgSysCode}'
and lrsj >='${startTime}'
and bjsj >='${bjsj}'
and bjsj >='${bjsjStart}'
and bjsj <='${bjsjEnd}'
and cjmj like CONCAT(#{cjmj},'%')
and lrsj <='${endTime}'
and cjmj_sfzh = '${cjmjSfzh}'
